code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white F boilermaker aged 24 yrs presents with Kidney for about 5 weeks. o:Height 62 in, Weight 113 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=7.9 mg/dL,BUN=125 mg/dl,K= 6.4 meq/L,GFR=20 mL/min, Urinalysis protein=100 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,PaCO2=30 mmHg,HCO3=27 meq/L a:Chronic Renal Failure p:administered Irbesartan - 150 mg daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 9 days h/o Kidney. pt is a F boilermaker aged 25 yrs. denies any alcohol use smokes one pack/day o:Height 61 in, Weight 109 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Abdominal CT Scan shows smaller than normal kidneys a:Chronic Renal Failure p:administered Irbesartan - 150 mg daily, performed Abdominal CT Scan, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
